problem.markdown:
Which of the following is not an example of a bad data quality?
>>Select the one correct answer<<
( ) A. Making up data ( ) B. Inputting the wrong data ( ) C. Not addressing data quality issues (X) D. Data entered on location
[explanation] Data entered on location isn’t in and of itself indicative of bad data quality. However, the data should be checked to ensure that it complies with the 4 dimensions of data quality. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.p: Which of the following is not an example of a bad data quality?
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Select the one correct answer

choicegroup.choice: C. Not addressing data quality issues

div.p: Data entered on location isn’t in and of itself indicative of bad data quality. However, the data should be checked to ensure that it complies with the 4 dimensions of data quality.
